invalid_policy_names: A problem should always have an assigned user.
Assets cannot be transferred to users whose clearance_level is below the asset's required_clearance_level.
High priority requests cannot be rejected on grounds of inactive user.
Priority 1 task derivative records cannot be cancelled, closed or rejected. They can only be resolved.
Asset with value greater than 10000$ cannot be transferred to users who already have more than 2 active assets.
